subject: Databox Dev Email Verification
html:
Hi $$$$,

Thanks for signing up to be a Databox developer! Please click here to verify your email address, or visit this link:

$$$$

Your account will be able to access admin features such as app screening and and store management tools as a result of the time period you registered in. These rights will be revoked and manually reassigned on the first full launch. If you find yourself without admin rights while you're supposed to have them, please contact us.

If you did not sign up to be a Databox developer, please ignore this email.

The Databox Team
